PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX dgov: <http://data.gov.be#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>

DELETE
	{	?dist dcat:accessURL ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?dist dcat:accessURL ?access .
		?dist dcat:downloadURL ?url .
		?dist dcterms:language <http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/NLD>,
								<http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/FRA>,
								<http://publications.europa.eu/resource/authority/language/ENG> .}
WHERE
	{ 	?dataset a dcat:Dataset .
		?dataset dcat:distribution ?dist .
		?dist dcat:accessURL ?o 
		BIND ( "http://opendatastore.brussels/dataset/" as ?old )
		BIND ( "http://data.gov.be/dataset/brussels/" as ?new )
		BIND ( IRI(REPLACE(STR(?dataset), ?new, ?old)) as ?access )
		BIND ( IRI(?o) as ?url )
	}
